message.body: Hi! This is Kennedy from couchsurfing. We can host you tonight and tomorrow if you still need a place!
Thanks so much! Buuuuut I already got some digs for my philly trek! Also I was imagining different types of guess who with walstreet crooks
They're mostly all food addicted pedophiles or depressed KGB operatives. Glad you found a place!
Either way y'all introduced a novel idea into my monotonous silly life. Much appreciated!
And I'm definitely stealing 'flabble'. Enjoy Philly!
Hey girl, so for some reason the girl I was supposed to stay with isnt picking up her phone, are you still free to host just in case she doesnt get back to me?
Sure! I should be home by 6:30, may be headed to west Philly later, but leanin towards staying in so should be around after that!
Oh perfect! Im actually supposed to go to dinner in west Philly to meet an old friend. Where do you live?
At 15th and spring garden. You can take a trolley or the el to city hall and transfer to the broad st line, spring garden is two stops north. I'll letcha know if either Jeremy or I end up out west!
Hey girl! So things worked out with the cs so I dont need a place to stay tonight but let me know if you come out to west philly
Great! I'm for sure staying in, had a wild one last night. Have fun!
